files.patch:
@@ -188,0 +188,6 @@
+  if test "x$OPENJDK_TARGET_OS" = xandroid ; then
+    INCLUDE_SA=false
+  fi
+  if test "x$OPENJDK_TARGET_OS" = xios ; then
+    INCLUDE_SA=false
+  fi

@@ -234,0 +234,7 @@
+################################################################################
+# Filter out specific modules for mobile platforms
+
+ifeq ($(call isTargetOs, ios), true)
+  MODULES_FILTER += jdk.sctp
+endif
+

@@ -35,1 +35,1 @@
-ifeq ($(call isTargetOs, linux aix), true)
+ifeq ($(call isTargetOs, linux aix android), true)

@@ -42,1 +42,1 @@
-ifeq ($(call isTargetOs, aix), false)
+ifeq ($(call isTargetOs, aix android ios), false)

@@ -128,0 +128,11 @@
+ifeq ($(ENABLE_HEADLESS_ONLY), true)
+  LIBAWT_CFLAGS += -DHEADLESS
+endif
+ifeq ($(call isTargetOs, ios), android)
+  LIBAWT_EXCLUDES += $(TOPDIR)/src/$(MODULE)/unix/native/common/java2d/x11
+endif
+ifeq ($(call isTargetOs, ios), true)
+  LIBAWT_EXCLUDES += $(TOPDIR)/src/$(MODULE)/unix
+endif
+
+
@@ -137,0 +148,2 @@
+LIBAWT_CFLAGS += $(CUPS_CFLAGS)
+
@@ -365,0 +378,7 @@
+  ifeq ($(call isTargetOs, android), true)
+    LIBAWT_HEADLESS_EXCLUDES += $(TOPDIR)/src/$(MODULE)/unix/native/common/java2d/x11
+  endif
+
+  ifeq ($(call isTargetOs, ios), true)
+    LIBAWT_HEADLESS_EXCLUDES += $(TOPDIR)/src/$(MODULE)/unix
+  endif
@@ -536,1 +556,1 @@
-else ifeq ($(call isTargetOs, macosx), true)
+else ifeq ($(call isTargetOs, macosx ios), true)
@@ -691,1 +711,3 @@
-TARGETS += $(BUILD_LIBJAWT)
+ifeq ($(call isTargetOs, ios), false)
+  TARGETS += $(BUILD_LIBJAWT)
+endif
